data.title: Great bagels
data.text: Great combo, Caribou made a great  mix with Brueggers, Starbucks has better coffee but poor selection for food. This combo should do well to make Caribou different.

data.title: Ron Rosenzweig
data.text: The best chain for Bagels in the state. Also love the breakfast items. Very affordable to all and Caribou Coffee next door. Definitely a must try.

data.title: Great spot, need more food!
data.text: Ate here for 2 breakfasts and 1 lunch while visiting the area over a weekend. Food is great and love all the different bagel flavors/cream cheese flavors and sandwich combinations they have! Service was great and the place seemed to always be busy! Only complaint would be the lack of food availability! Each time we went they were out of something and the last day we went for breakfast they had hardly any bagels left (and it was only 10am!!). But overall good place for a coffee spot.

data.title: Nice coffee shop
data.text:
Met there for breakfast and to do some work with a coworker prior to going into the office.  

The service was great and the bagel selections were plenty.  The staff was very patient with us knowing it was our first time there and explained things to us very thoroughly.  We did not feel rushed at all.  

We enjoyed our food and the atmosphere very much that we went back the next day and the woman who waited on us even remember us.

data.title: Great for breakfast!
data.text:
The combination of Bruegger's with a Caribou Coffee was an unexpected surprise as it didn't appear on the sign for the restaurant.  The breakfast sandwiches far exceed what Caribou would offer on its own and i expect the same would be true of Bruegger's traditional coffee drinks.
The restaurant was clean. The service was quick and friendly.

data.title: Love the Bagels
data.text: We always like a variety of bagels with their cream cheese, very close and convenient. Salt bagels are like large pretzels

data.title: Good coffee
data.text: My wife and I ordered coffee from here and we were satisfied with the brew. We will likely return again when in the Minneapolis area.

data.title: Nice new Bruegger's
data.text:
Ate here twice during a recent visit and had a good experience both times.

Service was quick and the food was good - nice & hot. 

It was great that Bruegger's & Caribou are together in this location - expanded coffee options over a typical Bruegger's.

The décor in this location was also more well done than an average Bruegger's (where you don't notice the décor, really). Subway tiles, bright, clean. Had a sign indicating their location and when it opened above the kitchen.

data.title: Yummy joint venture
data.text: Good, reliable Bruegger's bagel and Caribou coffee.  A delicious and fun treat.  Glad that they opened up and I can get both good coffee and fresh, hot bagels when I want.  Good job!!

data.title: Great food. Customer service could use a ton of work.
data.text: I come to this location multiple times a week. The food and drinks are always good but the service is seriously lacking. The workers seem to hate their jobs. Not very friendly expecially compared to the Starbucks next door. Almost everytime I ask for a cup of water with my order they forget, I order my drink without whip and still get whip on a number or occasions, today the guy taking my order at the drive through sounded completely uninterested and annoyed, the employees rarely says thanks or have a nice day, and the service is extreemly slow. Have driven off a few times because the wait was taking that long.

data.title: Great place to have breakfast or lunch with friends and family
data.text: Close to hotels, shopping, restaurants and night life.  We had out of town family visiting for Thanksgiving.  We met each morning for coffee and bagels.

data.title: 2 great restaurants - one line!
data.text: This co-restaurant is a great idea.  Both a Caribou and Brueggars joined together as one.  If I order a bagel, I can still use my Caribou gift card - what's not to like??  It's brand new, so it's a bit slower than I would like, but they are working hard!   And the best part if - they have a drive-thru!!!!
